price: Dájúdájú A ti fún (Ànábì) ’Ibrọ̄hīm ní ìmọ̀nà tirẹ̀ ṣíwájú (kí ó tó dàgbà). Àwa sì ń jẹ́ Onímọ̀ nípa rẹ̀.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
